result.label: End of Day
result.script: var d = new GlideTime(); d.setValue('23:59:59'); d.getValue();

result.label: Available UI Actions
result.script: if (current.type == 'form') { current.addQuery('sys_id', getAvailableUIActions(current.table, current.type, current.form_element)); } else {current.addQuery('sys_id', getAvailableUIActions(current.table, current.type, current.list_element));  }

result.label: Beginning of Day
result.script: var d = new GlideTime(); d.setValue('00:00:00'); d.getValue();

result.label: First Day of 2020 (Date and Time)
result.script: var d = new GlideDateTime(); d.setValue('2020-01-01 23:59:59'); d.getDisplayValue();

result.script: javascript: if (RP.getViewName() == "similarity") "Similarity template"; else if (RP.getViewName() == "clustering") "Clustering template"; else if(RP.getViewName() == "classification") "Classification template";
